refnamediv.refpurpose: Using Perl code to extend Virtuoso.

refsect1.title: Overview
refsect1.para: The following tutorial demonstrates how Virtuoso can be extended through the use of Perl.
The demonstrations in this section highlight transparent integration (hosting) between Virtuoso and the Perl Runtime.

refsect1.title: Prerequisites
refsect1.para: The following prerequisites ensure the usability of these tutorial demos on any platform with a Perl runtime:

itemizedlist.listitem: Perl 5.6 or higher for UNIX platforms or ActivePerl 5.8 or higher for Windows platforms
The DBI and DBD::ODBC Perl modules MUST be installed in order to run second example. (reffer to your Perl distribution documentation how to install them if they are not already installed)
Virtuoso Universal Server with Perl Runtime Hosting module
